forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening, then fog developing overnight. Low 34F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few snow showers after midnight. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing later during the night. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.title: Saturday
